ccre.ctrl

Interface IJoystick


  • public interface IJoystick
    A joystick that provides channels for all of its inputs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FloatInputPoll getAxisChannel(int axis)
      Get a FloatInputPoll representing the state of the specified axis on this joystick.
      FloatInput getAxisSource(int axis)
      Get a FloatInput that represents the given axis.
      BooleanInputPoll getButtonChannel(int button)
      Get a BooleanInputPoll representing whether or not the given button is pressed.
      EventInput getButtonSource(int id)
      Get an EventSource that will be fired when the given button is pressed.
      FloatInputPoll getXChannel()
      Get a FloatInputPoll for the X axis.
      FloatInputPoll getYChannel()
      Get a FloatInputPoll for the Y axis.

    • Method Detail

      • getButtonSource

        EventInput getButtonSource(int id)
        Get an EventSource that will be fired when the given button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        id - the button ID.
        Returns:
        the EventSource representing the button being pressed.

      • getAxisSource

        FloatInput getAxisSource(int axis)
        Get a FloatInput that represents the given axis.
        Parameters:
        axis - the axis ID.
        Returns:
        the FloatInput representing the axis.

      • getAxisChannel

        FloatInputPoll getAxisChannel(int axis)
        Get a FloatInputPoll representing the state of the specified axis on this joystick.
        Parameters:
        axis - the axis ID.
        Returns:
        the FloatInputPoll representing the status of the axis.

      • getButtonChannel

        Get a BooleanInputPoll representing whether or not the given button is pressed.

        Returns:
